bug.author: seveibar
bug.summary: Audio Transcription Interface is blank when reloading a configuration
bug.description: For some reason the interface loads blank, even if i had previously clicked something! To reproduce, just open an Audio Transcription template (e.g. on <denchmark-link:https://udt.dev>https://udt.dev</denchmark-link> or locally) and click Audio Transcription, then change some settings on the config page, navigate away and come back. It's always empty! <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1910070/94280097-01f11c80-ff1b-11ea-8c9c-1b432ba2b8aa.png></denchmark-link>
